metadata:
========
Series: DT.TDS.DECT.CD

Aggregationmethod: Sum
--------
Dataset: International Debt Statistics
--------
IndicatorName: Debt service on external debt, total (TDS, current US$)
--------
License_Type: CC BY-4.0
--------
License_URL: https://datacatalog.worldbank.org/public-licenses#cc-by
--------
Longdefinition: Total debt service is the sum of principal repayments and interest actually paid in currency, goods, or services on long-term debt, interest paid on short-term debt, and repayments (repurchases and charges) to the IMF. Data are in current U.S. dollars.
--------
Periodicity: Annual
--------
Shortdefinition: Total debt service is the sum of principal repayments and interest actually paid in currency, goods, or services on long-term debt, interest paid on short-term debt, and repayments (repurchases and charges) to the IMF. Data are in current U.S. dollars.
--------
Source: World Bank, International Debt Statistics.
--------
Topic: Economic Policy & Debt: External debt: Debt service
